var_nm_impacted_dst: APP_CONTRACT_TERM from RADAR.D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK left join RADAR.T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID on ( D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK.INTRODUCER_ID = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.INTRODUCER_ID and D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO and D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK.ASSESSMENT_NO = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.ASSESSMENT_NO and D_RADAR_ESA_ACCT_APPLCN_LINK.F_APP = 1 ) left join RADAR.RADAR_ESA_APP_BUR_IND_LINK D_RADAR_ESA_APP_BUREAU_LINK on ( T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.INTRODUCER_ID = D_RADAR_ESA_APP_BUREAU_LINK.INTRODUCER_ID and T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO = D_RADAR_ESA_APP_BUREAU_LINK.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO and D_RADAR_ESA_APP_BUREAU_LINK.F_APPLICANT_BUREAU = 1 ) left join ( select distinct ESA_APP_BUREAU_LINK.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO

var_nm_impacted_dst: A_TOTAL_INSURANCE from RADAR.RADAR_AMB_CNTRCT_APPLCN_LINK RADAR_AMB_CNTRCT_APPLCN_LINK left join RADAR.T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID on ( RADAR_AMB_CNTRCT_APPLCN_LINK.REGION = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.REGION and RADAR_AMB_CNTRCT_APPLCN_LINK.INTRODUCER_ID = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.INTRODUCER_ID and RADAR_AMB_CNTRCT_APPLCN_LINK.ASSESSMENT_NUMBER = T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.ASSESSMENT_NO ) left join RADAR.RADAR_ESA_APP_BUR_IND_LINK radar_esa_app_bur_ind_link on ( T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.INTRODUCER_ID = radar_esa_app_bur_ind_link.INTRODUCER_ID and T_SME_OBS_ESA_APP_RESID.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO = radar_esa_app_bur_ind_link.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO and radar_esa_app_bur_ind_link.F_APPLICANT_BUREAU = 1 ) left join ( select distinct esa_app_bur_ind_link.ORIGINAL_ASST_NO
